about_me.name: Santiago Hincapié Murillo
about_me.title: About me
about_me.descriptionFirst: I am passionate about computer technology, languages, culture and reading. I love meeting people from all kinds of cultures, creating and sharing with them all kinds of memories that will be treasured for life. Also, I am excited to see and practice martial arts.
about_me.descriptionSecond: I have knowledge of offensive computer security, ethical hacking and pentesting. I am also passionate about both web development and development for mobile devices. Whenever I start a new project in the short, medium or long term, I encourage myself to do a lot of research on it.

experience.web: HTML , CSS , JavaScript: Some little games and few web pages.
experience.python: Python - Django: Develop few and simple web pages the Django Framework. Just Python, a simple blockchain program in 2020.
experience.dart: Dart - Flutter: Multiple mobile apps (Quiz App, Cooking App, Chat App).

education.diploma: Diploma: Cyber-Security Offensive Pentesting Diploma with DragonJAR in 2019 (Manizales, Colombia)
education.school: School: Colegio Inglés De los Andes (Santiago de Cali, Colombia)

languages.japanese: Japanese: Studied for more than 5 years
